channel.title: Whip Emote
channel.description:
Hey Mopar
I just recently added a custom whip 'Lime Whip', which is working fine execpt for the fact that it has the incorrect emote when using a regular attack and it stays in one spot when I attack, run, walk or anything. How can I add the correct whip emote and make it move when it needs to? I know what it is I just need to know how/where to add it.
I am using delta if it helps and any help would be greatly appreciated
-Xevi

item.title: Whip Emote
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“Xevi, post:3, topic:465904”]So now the attack works but it still stays in one spot when I walk, run, and attack.

http://prntscr.com/ixrlw[/quote]
its not animated you can do this by looking at the model in datmaker then go down to a thing that says “No Anim” and change it to “Right Hand”

Read full topic

item.title: Whip Emote
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Go to client and search for whip
you should get something like this

if(id == 4151) // whip { return 1658; }

now make you code look like this now

if(id == 4151|| id == ####) // whip { return 1658; }
the ####=your item id for your whip
now keep searching for the whip but only change/add this

now once you get to a code like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) // whip { return 1659; }
all you need to do is add this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) // whip { return 1659; }
and again the ####=is the item id for your whip

Read full topic
